short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate how many coins are needed to reach a level based on your current XP!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple to use extension where you can input your currentxp and level you want to reach and calculate the amount of coins you need to wager in order to get there. 
P.S. would be appreciated it if you were to use my code : RollExtension
